__scriptHooks.hmac: async (name, ...args) => { const [tsOrBody] = args; const crypto = require('crypto'); const secret = client.global.get('hmacSecret') || ''; const msg = name === 'body' ? tsOrBody : tsOrBody + '.' + request.body.text; const h = crypto.createHmac('sha256', secret).update(msg, 'utf8').digest('hex'); return h; }
